roleset.name: have power over, bossy, in charge of

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Taiwan currently ranks fourth in the world in value of IT production , and , if you include the plants established by Taiwan investors across the globe , Taiwanese - controlled firms lead the world in manufacturing of IT hardware .

example.name: control-v: passive/relative clause
example.text: ...[NL Industries]-1 , controlled *trace*-1 by Dallas investor Harold Simmons...

example.name: control-v: With instrument
example.text: Instead of using the remote control, it is controlled with iPhone or Android app.
example.arg: Instead of using the remote control,

example.name: control-n: Both args, within LVC
example.text: I do n't have control over them as I would an employee of the Daily Record or the Dispatch because they are stringers and independent .
example.arg: as I would an employee of the Daily Record or the Dispatch
because they are stringers and independent.

example.name: control-n: all arguments
example.text: Mother Nature has exhibited her control over mankind with her record rainfall that brought an end to our drought cycle.
example.arg: with her record rainfall that brought an end to our drought cycle.

example.name: controlled-j: Args 0, 1
example.text: It 's full Republican controlled; it will be a great example of what low tax goverment looks like if they balance through cuts .

example.name: controlling-j: arg0
example.text: He is very possesive and controlling but he has no right to be as we are not together .

example.name: controlling-j: all args
example.text: Kyle, in the first post on this topic, was controlling of Karen with his assertion that he earned the money, and thus Karen was responsible for everything else that went on in the couple?s life.
example.arg: in the first post on this topic
with his assertion that he earned the money, and thus Karen was responsible for everything else that went on in the couple?s life.

example.name: take_control-l
example.text: Researchers at West Coast universities first took control of a General Motors car in 2010 using cellular and Bluetooth connections and highlighting a gaping security risk to the motor industry.

roleset.note: CONTROL-V NOTES: I still predict an instrument. (from control.01-v)
CONTROL-N NOTES: Based on verb entry control.01. Corresponding VN class is enforce-63. (from control.01-n)
CONTROLLED-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from controlled.01-j)
CONTROLLING-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-P01, control-v.01, control-n.01. Corresponds to VNcls enforce-63. (from controlling.01-j)
